Class ApplicationController

java.lang.Object
controller.ApplicationController
public class ApplicationController extends Object
Controller class that handles all Application-related logic. Controllers should use this class instead of accessing Application model directly. Follows Dependency Inversion Principle by depending on CsvHandler interface abstraction and accepting InternshipController as dependency instead of creating it.
Since:
2025-11-16
Version:
1.0
Author:
NTU SC2002 Group

  • Field Details

    • csvHandler

      private final CsvHandler<Application> csvHandler
      CSV handler for persistence operations

    • internshipController

      private final InternshipController internshipController
      Internship controller for coordinating with internship operations

  • Constructor Details

    • ApplicationController

      public ApplicationController(CsvHandler<Application> csvHandler, InternshipController internshipController)
      Constructs an ApplicationController with the specified dependencies. Follows Dependency Inversion Principle - depends on abstractions, not concretions.
      Parameters:
      csvHandler - The CSV handler for persistence operations
      internshipController - The internship controller for coordination

    • ApplicationController

      public ApplicationController()
      Default constructor for backward compatibility. Uses singleton instances.

  • Method Details

    • createApplication

      public Application createApplication(int internshipID, Student student, InternshipController internshipControllerParam)
      Creates an application for a student to a specific internship. Students can only select internships that are visible to them (already filtered by major, level, and visibility).
      Parameters:
      internshipID - The ID of the internship to apply to
      student - The student submitting the application
      internshipControllerParam - Controller to retrieve internship details
      Returns:
      The created Application object
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if internship not found or student ineligible

    • getApplicationsForInternship

      public List<Application> getApplicationsForInternship(int internshipID, InternshipController internshipController)
      Retrieves all applications for a specific internship. Overloaded method - can use InternshipController or find directly.
      Parameters:
      internshipID - The ID of the internship
      internshipController - Controller to retrieve internship details
      Returns:
      List of applications for the internship
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if internship not found

    • getApplicationsForInternship

      public List<Application> getApplicationsForInternship(int internshipID)
      Retrieves all applications for an internship (overloaded without controller parameter). Creates a temporary InternshipController internally for MVC compliance. NOTE: Prefer using the overload with InternshipController parameter for better performance.
      Parameters:
      internshipID - The ID of the internship
      Returns:
      List of applications for the internship
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if internship not found

    • hasStudentAppliedForInternship

      public boolean hasStudentAppliedForInternship(Student student, int internshipID)
      Checks if a student has applied for a specific internship. Used to allow students to view internships they've applied for even if visibility is off.
      Parameters:
      student - The student to check
      internshipID - The ID of the internship
      Returns:
      true if student has applied, false otherwise

    • getApplicationsForStudent

      public List<Application> getApplicationsForStudent(Student student)
      Retrieves all applications submitted by a student. Students can view all their applications, including those with WITHDRAWAL_REQUESTED status. Always reloads from CSV to ensure fresh data.
      Parameters:
      student - The student whose applications to retrieve
      Returns:
      List of all applications submitted by the student

    • findApplicationByID

      public Application findApplicationByID(int applicationID, Student student)
      Finds an application by ID from a student's applications.
      Parameters:
      applicationID - The ID of the application to find
      student - The student whose applications to search
      Returns:
      The found Application object
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if application not found

    • findApplicationByID

      public Application findApplicationByID(int appID)
      Finds an application by ID from all internships. Uses InternshipController for proper MVC separation. Overloaded method - searches across all applications system-wide.
      Parameters:
      appID - The ID of the application to find
      Returns:
      The found Application object
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if application not found

    • getWithdrawalRequests

      public List<Application> getWithdrawalRequests()
      Retrieves all withdrawal requests pending staff approval. Loads applications from CSV first to ensure fresh data.
      Returns:
      List of applications with WITHDRAWAL_REQUESTED status

    • getAllApplications

      private List<Application> getAllApplications(InternshipController internshipControllerParam)
      Retrieves all applications from all internships. Uses InternshipController for proper MVC separation. Private helper method used by findApplicationByID.
      Parameters:
      internshipControllerParam - Controller instance to ensure internships are loaded
      Returns:
      List of all applications system-wide

    • withdrawApplication

      public void withdrawApplication(int applicationID, Student student, String reason)
      Submits a withdrawal request for an application.
      Parameters:
      applicationID - The ID of the application to withdraw
      student - The student requesting withdrawal
      reason - Optional reason for withdrawal (can be null)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if application not found or ineligible for withdrawal

    • acceptApplication

      public void acceptApplication(int applicationID, Student student)
      Accepts a successful application, confirming the student's placement.
      Parameters:
      applicationID - The ID of the application to accept
      student - The student accepting the application
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if application not found or not in SUCCESSFUL status

    • approveWithdrawal

      public void approveWithdrawal(int applicationID)
      Approves a withdrawal request.
      Parameters:
      applicationID - The ID of the application
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if application not in WITHDRAWAL_REQUESTED status

    • rejectWithdrawal

      public void rejectWithdrawal(int applicationID)
      Rejects a withdrawal request.
      Parameters:
      applicationID - The ID of the application
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if application not in WITHDRAWAL_REQUESTED status

    • confirmPlacement

      public void confirmPlacement(int internshipID, int applicationID, InternshipController internshipController)
      Confirms student placement for an internship. Handles both approving (PENDING → SUCCESSFUL) and confirming placement (SUCCESSFUL → ACCEPTED). Overloaded method - uses internshipID to find application.
      Parameters:
      internshipID - The ID of the internship
      applicationID - The ID of the application
      internshipController - Controller to retrieve internship details
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if application not found or not in PENDING/SUCCESSFUL status

    • confirmPlacement

      public void confirmPlacement(int applicationID)
      Confirms student placement (overloaded without internshipController). Finds application by ID directly and updates status.
      Parameters:
      applicationID - The ID of the application
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if application not found or not in PENDING/SUCCESSFUL status

    • rejectApplication

      public void rejectApplication(int internshipID, int applicationID, InternshipController internshipController)
      Rejects a pending application. Company Representatives can reject PENDING applications, setting status to UNSUCCESSFUL.
      Parameters:
      internshipID - The ID of the internship
      applicationID - The ID of the application
      internshipController - Controller to retrieve internship details
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if application not found or not in PENDING status

    • rejectApplication

      public void rejectApplication(int applicationID)
      Rejects a pending application (overloaded without internshipController). Finds application by ID directly and sets status to UNSUCCESSFUL.
      Parameters:
      applicationID - The ID of the application
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if application not found or not in PENDING status

    • rejectPlacement

      public void rejectPlacement(int applicationID, Student student)
      Rejects a placement offer. Students can reject SUCCESSFUL or ACCEPTED applications, setting status to UNSUCCESSFUL. Updates internship filled slots if application was previously ACCEPTED.
      Parameters:
      applicationID - The ID of the application
      student - The student rejecting the placement
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if application not found or not in SUCCESSFUL/ACCEPTED status

    • loadApplicationsFromCsv

      public void loadApplicationsFromCsv(InternshipController internshipControllerParam)
      Loads all applications from CSV file. Clears existing data and reloads from disk. Ensures internships are loaded first (applications depend on them).
      Parameters:
      internshipControllerParam - Controller to ensure internships are loaded
